sqlMap.sql:
Select a.RPTMODELID,a.rpt_code,a.rpt_name,a.crename,to_char(a.cretime,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as cretime,a.rpt_sql,a.remark,a.state,IS_PRIVILEGE From ${SYSSCHEMA}.T_SYS_RPTMODEL a
ORDER BY RPT_CODE
sqlMap.select: Select A.RPT_CODE,A.RPT_NAME,A.RPT_SQL,A.IS_PRIVILEGE As Is_ROLE,A.REMARK,a.User_privilege ,a.ROLE_privilege ,a.group_privilege,a.USER_PRIVILEGE_NAME,a.ROLE_privilege_name,a.group_privilege_name From ${SYSSCHEMA}.T_SYS_RPTMODEL A where RPTMODELID = #hidRptPk#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ${SYSSCHEMA}.T_SYS_RPTMODEL SET RPT_CODE = #rptCode#, RPT_NAME = #rptName#, RPT_SQL = #rptSql#, REMARK = #remark#, IS_PRIVILEGE = #isRole#, UPDATER = #uptPerson#, UPDTIME = sysdate, User_privilege = #roleUser#, User_privilege_name = #roleUserName#, ROLE_privilege = #roleCode#, ROLE_privilege_name = #roleName#, group_privilege = #workGroupCode#, group_privilege_name = #workGroupName# WHERE RPTMODELID = #hidRptPk#
sqlMap.select: Select b.* From Dual Left Join ( $rptSql$ ) b On 1=1

SELECT RPTCOLCONFID, RPTMODELID, PHYSICNAME, LOGICNAME, COL_TYPE, ISCONDITION, MUSTINPUT, MATCH_MODEL, COMPONENTTYPE, COMPONENTCONDITION, HEADDISPLAY, COL_INDEX, DISPLAY FROM ${SYSSCHEMA}.T_SYS_RPTCOLCONF WHERE RPTMODELID = #hidRptPk#
ISCONDITION = '1'
HEADDISPLAY = '1'
ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(NVL(COL_INDEX,0))
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ${SYSSCHEMA}.T_SYS_RPTCOLCONF( RPTCOLCONFID, RPTMODELID, PHYSICNAME, LOGICNAME, COL_TYPE, ISCONDITION, MUSTINPUT, MATCH_MODEL, COMPONENTTYPE, COMPONENTCONDITION, HEADDISPLAY, COL_INDEX, DISPLAY )VALUES( #RPTCOLCONFID#, #RPTMODELID#, #PHYSICNAME#, #LOGICNAME#, #COL_TYPE#, #ISCONDITION#, #MUSTINPUT#, #MATCH_MODEL#, #COMPONENTTYPE#, #COMPONENTCONDITION#, #HEADDISPLAY#, #COL_INDEX#, #DISPLAY# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM ( Select a.RPTMODELID,a.rpt_code,a.rpt_name,a.crename,to_char(a.cretime,'yyyy-mm-dd') as cretime,a.rpt_sql,a.remark,a.state,IS_PRIVILEGE From ${SYSSCHEMA}.T_SYS_RPTMODEL a WHERE IS_Privilege = '0' UNION ALL Select a.RPTMODELID,a.rpt_code,a.rpt_name,a.crename,to_char(a.cretime,'yyyy-mm-dd') as cretime,a.rpt_sql,a.remark,a.state,IS_PRIVILEGE From ${SYSSCHEMA}.T_SYS_RPTMODEL a WHERE IS_Privilege = '1' AND EXISTS (SELECT RPTMODELID FROM ${SYSSCHEMA}.T_SYS_RPTPRIVILEGE B WHERE A.RPTMODELID = B.RPTMODELID AND B.USER_ID = #userPk#) ) ORDER BY RPT_CODE

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( Select a.RPTMODELID,a.rpt_code,a.rpt_name,a.crename,to_char(a.cretime,'yyyy-mm-dd') as cretime,a.rpt_sql,a.remark,a.state,IS_PRIVILEGE From ${SYSSCHEMA}.T_SYS_RPTMODEL a WHERE IS_Privilege = '0' UNION ALL Select a.RPTMODELID,a.rpt_code,a.rpt_name,a.crename,to_char(a.cretime,'yyyy-mm-dd') as cretime,a.rpt_sql,a.remark,a.state,IS_PRIVILEGE From ${SYSSCHEMA}.T_SYS_RPTMODEL a WHERE IS_Privilege = '1' AND EXISTS (SELECT RPTMODELID FROM T_SYS_RPTPRIVILEGE B WHERE A.RPTMODELID = B.RPTMODELID AND B.USER_ID = #userPk#) ) ORDER BY RPT_CODE
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ${SYSSCHEMA}.T_SYS_RPTPRIVILEGE(RPTPRIVILEGEID,RPTMODELID,USER_ID) Select SEQ_T_SYS_RPTPRIVILEGE.NEXTVAL,#hidRptPk#,d.Yhbh From ${SYSSCHEMA}.T_SYS_XTYH d Left Join ${SYSSCHEMA}.T_SYS_XTYHjs b On b.Xtyhid = d.Xtyhid Where b.XTJSID in ${XTJSID} And b.Delflag = 0

INSERT INTO ${SYSSCHEMA}.T_SYS_RPTPRIVILEGE(RPTPRIVILEGEID,RPTMODELID,USER_ID) Select SEQ_T_SYS_RPTPRIVILEGE.NEXTVAL,#hidRptPk#,b.Yhbh From ${SYSSCHEMA}.T_SYS_GZZCY a Left Join ${SYSSCHEMA}.T_SYS_XTYH b On a.Xtyhid = b.Xtyhid And b.Delflag = 0 Left Join ${SYSSCHEMA}.T_SYS_GZZXX d On a.Gzzxxid = d.Gzzxxid Where a.Delflag = 0 And d.Gzzbh = '001' And b.Yhbh Is Not Null
sqlMap.select: Select column_name as col_name,data_length as col_length From user_tab_cols a Where a.Table_Name = #tableName#
Select column_name From user_tab_cols a Where a.Table_Name = #tableName#
select COLUMN_NAME from dba_cons_columns where table_name=#tableName# And POSITION =1
Select TABLE_NAME From user_tables Where table_name In ($tableNames$)

select t.COLUMN_NAME from user_tab_columns t,user_col_comments c where t.table_name = c.table_name and t.column_name = c.column_name And t.table_name= #tableName# And (c.comments Not Like '%NO_EDIT%' Or c.comments Is Null)

select RPTCOLCONFID,RPTMODELID,PHYSICNAME,LOGICNAME, COL_TYPE, ISCONDITION , MUSTINPUT, MATCH_MODEL,COMPONENTTYPE,COMPONENTCONDITION,HEADDISPLAY, COL_INDEX, DISPLAY from T_SYS_RPTCOLCONF u where u.RPTMODELID=#RPTMODELID#
